game.name: Pixel Gun Apocalypse 4
game.description:
Pixel Gun Apocalypse 4 is an ultimate Minecraft-style multiplayer video game designed to all those boys who love to explore the world of action gaming. Choose from the soldier and zombie?s team in this sequel of Pixel Gun Apocalypse 3. It?s a time to get your guns ready and join the battle to show your fighting skills against the players from all around the world. The best combat you have ever faced is waiting for you kids. Enter into the fight in a middle without signing up or downloading anything! 
You are sure to have a lot of fun in this one of the best free online FPS game series. This advanced version features the ultimate improvements and many new content. Some of its latest advancements include dozens of new maps and a reworked loadout system. Create your own match or join matches created by other players. Be an elite soldier and collect as many points as you can to unlock more powerful weapons, including the dangerous rocket launcher. Dive right away into the combat and experience the best action in this brand new shooting game! 
You can use up to 3 weapons to reply your opponents in the combat. There are various maps to explore in this one of the coolest fighting games 3d. Stay against the dangerous players and challenge your shooting skills. Developed by Mentolatux, Pixel Gun Apocalypse 4 is highly appreciated today by many PC game lovers. This web browser game includes easy game controls, including WASD or arrow keys to move, left click to shoot, R to reload, Shift to run, Ctrl to prone and C to crouch. Good luck kids to witness the unmatched action world!
